name: Quicken 2016 Backup File
summary: Learn about .QUICKEN2016BACKUP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The QUICKEN2016BACKUP file is designed for users looking to secure their account information from the .QUICKEN2016 file. In case the QUICKEN2016 file becomes corrupt or is lost, the backup file can be used to restore the information.

To create a backup file in Quicken, simply select File → Save a Backup... and choose the destination folder. To restore data from a backup file, select File → Restore a Backup... and locate the backup file.
NOTE: QUICKEN2016BACKUP files are similar to .QUICKENBACKUP files created by Quicken Essentials.

description: A QUICKEN2016BACKUP file is a backup file created by Quicken 2016 financial management software. It contains all user and account data that can be used for back up purposes.
